review: Its great and so easy to install.  I recomend this to all prime users...worth every penny.
author: keith m

review: I thought I would only pay for the Fire Stick. However!!!!!!!!! I've learned that I still have to pay for any movies I want to see, any second seasons I enjoy, and there is no such thing as Netflix. I have an account with Netflix and it is not accepted by Amazon. You want to be scammed??? Join Amazon............ Lying , Greedy, DIRT BAGS
author: Jack Smith

review: 5 stars much better than the chrome cast highly recommended
author: Debra Salters

review: Does not Crunchyroll, which is a disappointment. However, the video is extremely laggy and jumpy. Videos also sometimes lag out and return to the menu screen unexpectedly. It definitely is the product and not my internet, either--I replaced the Fire Stick with an Apple TV and have had absolutely no problems since. Shame, since I was avoiding the Apple TV due to the cost and thought the Fire Stick would be a great deal but it ended up being a terrible product. I could never get through even a 30 minute show without it having some type of issue.
author: Xuan Do

review: This is a great streaming device!!!!  Very much easier to use than anything else we have used (Wii and computer).  Excellent selection of free content with Prime membership:) We really love Amazon products and service/support!
author: bgar

review: everything work well enjoying the fire stick
author: Richard Fee

review: Love it but there is delay if other internet products are running.
author: Di

review: I Love it! I have cable tv & although there 1 million channels hard to find the movies & shows I want to watch. This was easy to set up & I have even ordered the voice remote for it

review: Easy to connect..... no problems so far.
